hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
EXIST_VERS=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai04 "cd /opt/tcserver/dai_etl_feeder; jar xf dai-etl-feeder-3.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF; grep Implementation-Version META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'; rm -fR META-INF"`
VERSION="3.0.0.1_${BUILD_NUMBER}"
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
print Beginning Roll-forward update for app/db print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ print ./deployjar.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -t dai-etl-feeder -e 10.13.18.117 -r ${VERSION} -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.121:1522:scrum003" -p SC3_REPORTING_ODS -u SC3_REPORTING_ODS -c SC3_CORE -b SC3_OSS_BAR -v
print Beginning Roll-back for app/db to prior version ${EXIST_VERS} from latest package version ${VERSION} print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ print ./deployjar.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -t dai-etl-feeder -e 10.13.18.117 -r ${EXIST_VERS} -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.121:1522:scrum003" -p SC3_REPORTING_ODS -u SC3_REPORTING_ODS -c SC3_CORE -b SC3_OSS_BAR -v print
print Beginning Roll-forward update for app/db from existing version ${EXIST_VERS} to latest package version ${VERSION} print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ./deployjar.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -t dai-etl-feeder -e 10.13.18.117 -r ${VERSION} -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.121:1522:scrum003" -p SC3_REPORTING_ODS -u SC3_REPORTING_ODS -c SC3_CORE -b SC3_OSS_BAR -v
STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi

#!/bin/ksh VERSION="3.0.0.1_${BUILD_NUMBER}"
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 report stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 oss_bar stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 smsi-admin stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 smsi stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 billing stop
cd /opt/build/scripts ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -e devint
print Beginning Rebuild from scratch for app/db to latest package version ${VERSION} print print
cd /opt/checkouts/dai-etl-feeder/src/main/resources/liquibase/cisys
echo "@genUser.scrum3.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.121)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=scrum003)))'
STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./deployJarRebuild.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -t dai-etl-feeder -e scrum3 -r ${VERSION} -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.121:1522:scrum003" -p SC3_REPORTING_ODS -u SC3_REPORTING_ODS -c SC3_CORE -b SC3_OSS_BAR -v
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 smsi-admin start /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 smsi start /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 billing start /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 oss_bar start
